name: CARGO (Spectral Studios)
description:
A new agent who was sent to clean an infection that occurred in the Cargo company, but you will discover that it was not only an infection.

C A R G O is inspired by SCP: Containment Breach and Dead Space.

Note: This game  is for Windows 64-bit versions.

DOWNLOAD TIPS

You need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the downloaded game files. 

Once you extracted the files with one of these programs, find and open the extracted folder and run the executable file found inside to run the game.

You can also follow the game in Gamejolt!

https://gamejolt.com/games/Cargo/568282

CREDITS
